original_text: I will put you under the power of those men that you gave yourself to. They will destroy the places that you built for your idols. They will remove all your clothes. They will take your beautiful jewels. Then they will leave you with nothing, completely bare.
korean_text: 내가 또 너를 그들의 손에 넘기리니 그들이 네 누각을 헐며 네 높은 대를 부수며 네 의복을 벗기고 네 장식품을 빼앗고 네 몸을 벌거벗겨 버려 두며

sentences.original_text: I will put you under the power of those men
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너를 그 사람들의 권세 아래 두겠다

sentences.original_text: that you built for your idols
They will remove all your clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 네 모든 옷을 벗길 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will take your beautiful jewels
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 네 아름다운 보석들을 빼앗을 것이다

sentences.original_text: Then they will leave you with nothing
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 아무것도 없는 너를 버려두고 떠날 것이다
